TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PublishingCache extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides the static method to output the cache contents of an object to a Stream object.

example.code: using Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing;using System.IO;Stream stream;SPSite site;// Ouput cache contents of site to stream.PublishingCache.ListCacheContents(stream,site);
Imports Microsoft.SharePoint.PublishingImports System.IOPrivate stream As StreamPrivate site As SPSite' Ouput cache contents of site to stream.PublishingCache.ListCacheContents(stream,site)

Docs.param: Specifies the stream to which the cache contents of site are output.

Docs.summary: Outputs the cache contents of an object to a Stream object.
